data.question: What is the yield percentage of the monocationic compound 1?
What type of binding mode does the allyl ligand exhibit in the allylcalcium monocation?
Is the coordination geometry around the calcium atom in compound 1 linear or bent?
Does the allylcalcium monocation polymerize 1,3-butadiene under the same conditions used for bis(allyl)calcium?
What is the coordination geometry of the zinc atom in the anionic part of compound 1?
Is the allyl exchange rate in compound 1 higher or lower than that in bis(allyl)zinc?
What causes the decrease of the allyl exchange rate in the [Ca-(C3H5)]+[Zn(C3H5)3]- system when compared to compound 1?
Are the Ca-O bond lengths in compound 1 longer or shorter compared to calcium complexes with non-macrocyclic ether ligands?
What is the coalescence temperature of compound 1 in THF solution?
Does compound 1 maintain its ionic structure in THF solution at -80°C?
What is the effect of the crown ether ligand on the allyl exchange rate in compound 1?
data.answer: It causes a decrease of the allyl exchange rate

data.question: Is the C1-Ca1-C3' angle in compound 1 indicative of a significant bending of the C-Ca-C unit?
data.answer: No, there is no significant bending

data.question: What is the role of [18]crown-6 in the synthesis of compound 1?
data.answer: It allows the isolation of the monocationic compound 1

data.question: What experimental technique was used to determine the formation of monoionic complexes in solution?
Does the allylcalcium monocation exhibit a s-allyl–metal interaction?
What is the significance of the non-bent coordination geometry in compound 1?
data.answer: It provides experimental evidence of low energy differences between bent and linear structures in organocalcium complexes

data.question: What is the effect of the formally monocationic character of calcium atoms on the Lewis acidity in compound 1?
data.answer: It increases the Lewis acidity of the calcium atoms

data.question: Are the C-C-C angles in the allyl fragment of the cationic part of compound 1 similar to those calculated for a delocalized allylic p system?
What is the effect of dissolving compound 1 in THF at room temperature?
What is the role of bis(allyl)zinc in the synthesis of compound 1?
data.answer: It reacts with bis(allyl)calcium, followed by the addition of [18]crown-6, to allow the isolation of the monocationic compound 1
